divs: Sighting DetailsThis happened at roughly 4pm yesterday over OKC. I was at hefner and penn area in my car. I saw this object leaving a contrail but when i looked close was clearly huge. I had to lok up at roughly 50 degrees to follow it as it constantly changed course and speed It also left a contrail from both sides of the object and i would estimate it was at roughly 40 to 50,0000 ft height. It was traveling in a sw direction and if the true south direction was where i was at looking south then it was roughly 10 degrees off south. I was able to follow the object for about 5 minutes before i lost sight of it. Since i am ex military and was a drill sergeant to boot i knew instantly this was not a aircraft of any sort i am aware of. Once i lost sight of the object when i went behind a building i lost sight of it and even when i came out from behind i did not see it again.
trends: There have been 78 other sightings in Oklahoma City
There were no other sightings in Oklahoma City on or around January 23rd 2013
Summary: cylindrical but huge even from distance. left contrail from both sides. constantly changed direc/speed.
